emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of varsity letter recipients, from left, first row: John Wilkins and William Lindsey; second row: David Webb, William Craven, Sam Fleming, Jerry McCrommon, Ray Cutler, Claude Griffin, Philip Cox, and Art Smith, with coach J.D. Geyer, posed in Letsche School
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 22, 1957, pg. A9 reads:"Letsche Honors Athletes - Letsche School honored the members of its basketball teams, the Varsity and All-Stars recently by presenting the boys with letters and trophies, in recognition of their fine sportsmanship. Top photo: Letter recipients were, left to right, first row: John Wilkins and William Lindsey.  Second row: David Webb, William Craven, Sam Fleming, Jerry McCrommon, Ray Cutler, Claude Griffin, Philip Cox, Art Smith and J.D. Geyer, coach...-Harris Photo."
